description: CuteMusic is a simple, lightweight and offline music player app for Android. CuteMusic is a simple, lightweight and open-source offline music player app for Android, using Material 3/You & Monet theming. It's Very fast and snappy! - Play any song from anywhere just by sharing the audio file to the app without downloading it! - Easy search across all your music/albums/artists! - Very fast and snappy! - No unnecessary permissions needed! - Material 3/You & Monet theming (+ Amoled mode)! - Blacklist Folders! - Beautiful landscape UI! - Tag Editor! - Playlist support ! - Material art: Color scheme dynamically changes depending on currently playing song's artwork !
